item.description:
This is an existing Saturday morning dog playgroup in beautiful Turner's Falls. Unity Park is across the street from one end of the Canalside Rail Trail, and next to the Connecticut River just north of the waterfalls from which Turners Falls gets its name.

This group gets together every Saturday morning at 10 am, even in the cold cold weather. The dogs are off leash and well behaved. It's great fun for dogs and humans alike!
item.how_to_find_us: "If I'm there, I have a black lab with a blue collar/leash."

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Unity Park - Dog Play Saturdays
